medalMultiEntireTeam.name: Annihilation
medalMultiEntireTeam.description: Land final blows on the entire enemy team before any of them respawn.

medalStreakCombined.name: Combined Fire
medalStreakCombined.description: In a single life, defeat 3 opposing Guardians while assisting or assisted by your teammates.

medalStreak5x.name: Ruthless
medalStreak5x.description: In a single life, defeat 5 opposing Guardians.

medalStreak10x.name: Unyielding
medalStreak10x.description: In a single life, defeat 10 opposing Guardians.

medalStreakTeam.name: Wrecking Crew
medalStreakTeam.description: As a team, defeat 7 opposing Guardians without any of your team dying.

medalStreakAbsurd.name: We Ran Out of Medals
medalStreakAbsurd.description: In a single life, defeat 20 opposing Guardians

medalPayback.name: Best Served Cold
medalPayback.description: Land the final blow on the Guardian who last defeated you.

medalAvenger.name: Blood For Blood
medalAvenger.description: Defeat an opponent who just defeated an ally.

medalQuickStrike.name: Quick Strike
medalQuickStrike.description: Defeat an opponent within the first 20 seconds of a match.

medalDefense.name: Not on My Watch
medalDefense.description: Land a final blow on an opponent who has damaged an ally.

medalDefeatHunterDodge.name: Dodge This
medalDefeatHunterDodge.description: Defeat a Hunter attempting to dodge.

medalDefeatTitanBrace.name: Barricade Breaker
medalDefeatTitanBrace.description: Defeat a Titan within 3 seconds of their deploying a Barricade.

medalDefeatWarlockSigil.name: Rift Breaker
medalDefeatWarlockSigil.description: Defeat a Warlock while they are within their active Rift.

medalCycle.name: The Cycle
medalCycle.description: In a single match, land at least one final blow with each class of weapon (Kinetic, Energy, Power) and ability (Melee, Grenade, Super).

medalSuperShutdown.name: Not So Fast, My Friend
medalSuperShutdown.description: Defeat an opposing Guardian using your Super while their Super is active.

medalMatchNeverTrailed.name: Never In Doubt
medalMatchNeverTrailed.description: Win a match in which your team never trailed.

medalMatchComeback.name: From the Jaws of Defeat
medalMatchComeback.description: Win a match after having trailed by a significant margin.

medalMatchBlowout.name: Crushed Them
medalMatchBlowout.description: Win a match with a large margin of victory.

medalMatchMostDamage.name: Fight Me!
medalMatchMostDamage.description: Deal the most total damage to opponents in a single match.

medalMatchUndefeated.name: Undefeated
medalMatchUndefeated.description: Complete a match in which you are never defeated by an opponent.

medalAbilityDawnbladeSlam.name: Falling Star
medalAbilityDawnbladeSlam.description: Defeat an opponent with Phoenix Dive while Daybreak is active.

medalAbilityDawnbladeAerial.name: Defying Gravity
medalAbilityDawnbladeAerial.description: In a single Daybreak activation, defeat two or more opponents without touching the ground.

medalAbilityVoidwalkerVortex.name: Singularity
medalAbilityVoidwalkerVortex.description: Defeat an opponent with a Nova Bomb Vortex.

medalAbilityVoidwalkerDistance.name: From Downtown
medalAbilityVoidwalkerDistance.description: Defeat two or more opponents with a Nova Bomb that was in the air for at least 5 seconds.

medalAbilityStormcallerLandfall.name: Thunderstruck
medalAbilityStormcallerLandfall.description: Defeat an opponent with Landfall while casting Stormtrance.

medalAbilityStormcallerMulti.name: Lightning Storm
medalAbilityStormcallerMulti.description: Defeat two or more opponents in a single Stormtrance activation.

medalAbilityFlowwalkerQuick.name: Lightning Strike
medalAbilityFlowwalkerQuick.description: Defeat an opponent within 3 seconds of activating Arc Staff.

medalAbilityFlowwalkerMulti.name: Hurricane
medalAbilityFlowwalkerMulti.description: Defeat 3 opponents in a single Arc Staff activation.

medalAbilityGunslingerQuick.name: Lethal Instinct
medalAbilityGunslingerQuick.description: Defeat an opponent within 2 seconds of activating Golden Gun.

medalAbilityGunslingerMulti.name: Handful of Bullets
medalAbilityGunslingerMulti.description: Defeat 3 opponents in a single Golden Gun activation.

medalAbilityNightstalkerTetherQuick.name: Entangled
medalAbilityNightstalkerTetherQuick.description: Defeat a tethered opponent within 5 seconds of casting Shadowshot.

medalAbilityNightstalkerLongRange.name: Longbow
medalAbilityNightstalkerLongRange.description: Defeat an opponent with  Shadowshot at a distance  greater than 30 meters.

medalAbilitySentinelWard.name: Perfect Guard
medalAbilitySentinelWard.description: Block fatal damage within 2 seconds of activating Ward of Dawn.

medalAbilitySentinelCombo.name: Flying Fortress
medalAbilitySentinelCombo.description: Defeat an opponent with a Shield Bash within 3 seconds of defeating an opponent with a Sentinel Shield melee.

medalAbilityJuggernautSlam.name: Absolute Force
medalAbilityJuggernautSlam.description: Defeat two or more opponents in a single Fists of Havoc slam.

medalAbilityJuggernautCombo.name: Striker Special
medalAbilityJuggernautCombo.description: In a single activation, defeat two opponents with Shoulder Charge, then a third with Fists of Havoc.

medalAbilitySunbreakerLongRange.name: Pitch Perfect
medalAbilitySunbreakerLongRange.description: Defeat an opponent with Hammer of Sol at a distance  greater than 30 meters.

medalAbilitySunbreakerMulti.name: Everything Looks Like a Nail
medalAbilitySunbreakerMulti.description: Defeat three opponents within a single Hammer of Sol activation.

medalWeaponAuto.name: Assault Specialist
medalWeaponAuto.description: In a single match, defeat 7 opponents with Auto Rifle final blows.

medalWeaponPulse.name: Lethal Cadence
medalWeaponPulse.description: In a single match, defeat 7 opponents with Pulse Rifle final blows.

medalWeaponScout.name: Field Scout
medalWeaponScout.description: In a single match, defeat 5 opponents at long range with  Scout Rifle final blows.

medalWeaponHandCannon.name: Hawkeye
medalWeaponHandCannon.description: In a single life, defeat two opponents with precision Hand Cannon final blows.

medalWeaponSmg.name: Sub Machinist
medalWeaponSmg.description: In a single life, defeat 2 opponents with Submachine Gun final blows.

medalWeaponSidearm.name: One for Each of You
medalWeaponSidearm.description: Deliver a final blow with a Sidearm within 5 seconds of landing a final blow with any other weapon.

medalWeaponSniper.name: Mission Control
medalWeaponSniper.description: Defeat two opponents with long range, precision Sniper Rifle final blows without switching weapons or reloading.

medalWeaponFusion.name: Cold Fusion
medalWeaponFusion.description: In a single life, defeat two opponents with a Fusion Rifle.

medalWeaponRocket.name: Splash Damage
medalWeaponRocket.description: Defeat two or more opponents with a single rocket.

medalWeaponGrenade.name: Calculated Trajectory
medalWeaponGrenade.description: In a single life, defeat three opponents with Grenade Launcher final blows.

medalWeaponShotgun.name: Close Encounters
medalWeaponShotgun.description: Defeat two opponents at close range with a Shotgun without switching weapons or reloading.

medalWeaponSword.name: Regent
medalWeaponSword.description: Defeat two opponents with a sword without switching weapons.

medalCountdownDefense.name: Counter Attack
medalCountdownDefense.description: Countdown: Defeat an opponent within 5 seconds of them setting a charge.

medalCountdownDetonated.name: Pyrotechnics
medalCountdownDetonated.description: Countdown: Set a charge that successfully detonates.

medalCountdownDefusedMulti.name: Bombs? What Bombs?
medalCountdownDefusedMulti.description: Countdown: Defuse multiple charges in a single match.

medalCountdownDefusedLastStand.name: Last Stand
medalCountdownDefusedLastStand.description: Countdown: Defuse the charge as the last Guardian standing.

medalCountdownRoundAllAlive.name: The Gang's All Here
medalCountdownRoundAllAlive.description: Countdown: Win a round with your entire team alive.

medalCountdownPerfect.name: Perfect Game
medalCountdownPerfect.description: Countdown: Win a Countdown match in which your opponent never scores and never sets a charge.

medalSurvivalWinLastStand.name: Lone Gun
medalSurvivalWinLastStand.description: Survival: Win a round as the last surviving Guardian on your team.

medalSurvivalUndefeated.name: Survivor
medalSurvivalUndefeated.description: Survival: Win a round without being defeated.

medalSurvivalQuickWipe.name: Minute to Win It
medalSurvivalQuickWipe.description: Survival: As a team, win a round within 1 minute.

medalSurvivalKnockout.name: Undertaker
medalSurvivalKnockout.description: Survival: Land all knockout blows on the opposing team in a single round.

medalSurvivalComeback.name: According to Plan
medalSurvivalComeback.description: Survival: Win a round despite being scoreless on Match Point.

medalSurvivalTeamUndefeated.name: Untouchable
medalSurvivalTeamUndefeated.description: Survival: Win a match where no one on your team is defeated across all rounds.

medalControlAdvantageHold.name: I Live Here Now
medalControlAdvantageHold.description: Control: Hold two or more zones for at least 1 minute.

medalControlPerimeterKill.name: Reclaimer
medalControlPerimeterKill.description: Control: Recapture a zone within 15 seconds of it being captured by your opponents.

medalControlCaptureAllZones.name: Capture and Control
medalControlCaptureAllZones.description: Control: Defeat two opponents with Zone Advantage within 10 seconds of capturing a zone.

medalControlMostAdvantage.name: Flagbearer
medalControlMostAdvantage.description: Control: Complete a Control match with the most combined Advantage and Power Play kills.

medalControlAdvantageStreak.name: Dominant Advantage
medalControlAdvantageStreak.description: Control: Score five Advantage or Power Play kills before the opponent recaptures a zone.

medalControlPowerPlayWipe.name: Power Overwhelming
medalControlPowerPlayWipe.description: Control: As a team, defeat all opposing Guardians at least once during a single Power Play.

medalSupremacyFirstCrest.name: First Secure
medalSupremacyFirstCrest.description: Supremacy: Secure the first crest in a match.

medalSupremacySecureStreak.name: Safe and Secured
medalSupremacySecureStreak.description: Supremacy: Secure three opposing crests in a single life.

medalSupremacyRecoverStreak.name: Steadfast Ally
medalSupremacyRecoverStreak.description: Supremacy: Recover three allied crests in a single life.

medalSupremacyNeverCollected.name: My Crest is My Own
medalSupremacyNeverCollected.description: Supremacy: Complete a match in which your crest is never collected by an opponent.

medalSupremacyCrestCreditStreak.name: Crestfallen
medalSupremacyCrestCreditStreak.description: Supremacy: In a single life, create five consecutive crests that are secured by your teammates.

medalSupremacyPerfectSecureRate.name: A Crown of Crests
medalSupremacyPerfectSecureRate.description: Supremacy: Complete a match with the most crests created and a 100% secure rate.

medalMayhemFirstSuper.name: Light 'Em Up
medalMayhemFirstSuper.description: Mayhem: Cast the first Super of the match.

medalMayhemGrenadeStreak.name: Fire in the Hole!
medalMayhemGrenadeStreak.description: Mayhem: In a single life, land five grenade final blows.

medalMayhemMeleeStreak.name: Punch and Pie
medalMayhemMeleeStreak.description: Mayhem: In a single life, land three melee final blows.

medalMayhemCastStreak.name: Superstar
medalMayhemCastStreak.description: Mayhem: In a single life, cast three Supers.

medalMayhemCastMulti.name: By Our Powers Combined…
medalMayhemCastMulti.description: Mayhem: As a team, rapidly cast all of your Supers.

medalMayhemKillStreak.name: Total Mayhem
medalMayhemKillStreak.description: Mayhem: As a team, land 10 Super final blows without anyone on your team being defeated.

medalCrimsonWeaponCombo.name: Polyarmory
medalCrimsonWeaponCombo.description: Crimson Days: In a single round, both you and your partner must land one final blow each with Kinetic, Energy, and Power weapons.

medalCrimsonRevengeMulti.name: Third Wheel
medalCrimsonRevengeMulti.description: Crimson Days: Rapidly defeat both your opponents while your partner is down.

medalCrimsonApartMulti.name: Broken Up
medalCrimsonApartMulti.description: Crimson Days: As a pair, defeat both your opponents within 3 seconds while they are separated from each other.

medalCrimsonSuddenDeath.name: Heartbreaker
medalCrimsonSuddenDeath.description: Crimson Days: Win a match in sudden death.

medalRumbleDefeatAllClasses.name: Best in Class
medalRumbleDefeatAllClasses.description: Rumble: In a single life, defeat at least one Hunter, one Titan, and one Warlock.

medalRumbleUnassistedStreak.name: Assassin
medalRumbleUnassistedStreak.description: Rumble: In a single life, land three unassisted final blows without taking any damage in between.

medalRumbleStealStreak.name: Pickpocket
medalRumbleStealStreak.description: Rumble: In a single life, steal five final blows from your opponents.

medalRumbleTop3.name: Podium Finish
medalRumbleTop3.description: Rumble: Finish in the top three.

medalRumbleDefeatAllPlayers.name: Round Robin
medalRumbleDefeatAllPlayers.description: Rumble: In a single life, defeat each opposing player at least once.

medalRumbleBetterThanAllCombined.name: The Sum of All Tears
medalRumbleBetterThanAllCombined.description: Rumble: Win a match with a score greater than the sum of all opponents' scores.

medalShowdownMostKills.name: Local Maxima
medalShowdownMostKills.description: Showdown: Defeat the most opponents in a single round.

medalShowdownAmmoStreak.name: Denial of Service
medalShowdownAmmoStreak.description: Showdown: As a team, collect three consecutive ammo crates in a single match.

medalShowdownRetakeLead.name: Clawing Back
medalShowdownRetakeLead.description: Showdown: Within a round, retake the lead after trailing by 5 points.

medalShowdownFullTeamSurvival.name: When the Dust Clears
medalShowdownFullTeamSurvival.description: Showdown: Win a Final Showdown in which your entire team survives.

medalShowdownForceFinalRound.name: We're Not Done Yet
medalShowdownForceFinalRound.description: Showdown: Force a Final Showdown round after trailing 0–2.

medalShowdownUndefeated.name: Invincible
medalShowdownUndefeated.description: Showdown: Win a match in which no one on your team is defeated.
